text: @realDonaldTrump Bill Gates, what a benevolent and kind person.  Thanks for not feeding the starving masses or storing some PPE for the world. Oh & thanks for your $100m donation for vaccines you will profit from.  I don’t give a shit if they jail me but know this #youcanshoveyourvaccine #covid19
